results.content:
Following is my observation:
pros: 
- In depth Explanation
- Covers all major concepts of Web Designing
- Good for beginners to understand HTML, CSS, Javascript
- Practical examples good for real time work
cons:
- Pace is slow, can be increased
- Not for Advanced Concepts in Javascript

Overall: Its a good course for starters in web designing to learn basics of html, css, javascript

results.content:
Good course to get a general idea of CSS and Javascript. The pace of the course is steady and the instructor explains it well. Adding exercises to the course can be good idea. This will stimulate the course undertakers to practice what they learnt.

Thanks.
